code: import React from'react';import{useContext}from'react';import FeedbackContext from'../context/FeedbackContext';import{jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";function FeedbackStats(){var _useContext=useContext(FeedbackContext),feedback=_useContext.feedback;console.log(Array.isArray(feedback)+" in feedback stats");var average=feedback.reduce(function(acc,curr){return acc+=curr.rating;},0)/feedback.length;return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"feedback-stats",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("h4",{children:[feedback.length," Reviews"]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("h4",{children:["Average Rating:",isNaN(average)?0:average]})]});}export default FeedbackStats;
